00027 #ifndef _ShaderProgramSet_
00028 #define _ShaderProgramSet_
00029 
00030 #include "OgreShaderPrerequisites.h"
00031 #include "OgreGpuProgram.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 namespace RTShader {
00035 
00046 class _OgreRTSSExport ProgramSet : public RTShaderSystemAlloc
00047 {
00048 
00049     // Interface.
00050 public:
00052     ProgramSet();
00053 
00055     ~ProgramSet();
00056 
00058     Program* getCpuVertexProgram();
00059 
00061     Program* getCpuFragmentProgram();
00062 
00064     GpuProgramPtr getGpuVertexProgram();
00065 
00067     GpuProgramPtr getGpuFragmentProgram();
00068 
00069     // Protected methods.
00070 protected:
00071     void setCpuVertexProgram(Program* vsCpuProgram);
00072     void setCpuFragmentProgram(Program* psCpuProgram);
00073 
00074     void setGpuVertexProgram(GpuProgramPtr vsGpuProgram);
00075     void setGpuFragmentProgram(GpuProgramPtr psGpuProgram);
00076 
00077 
00078     // Attributes.
00079 protected:
00080     // Vertex shader CPU program.
00081     Program* mVSCpuProgram;
00082     // Fragment shader CPU program.
00083     Program* mPSCpuProgram;
00084     // Vertex shader GPU program.
00085     GpuProgramPtr mVSGpuProgram;
00086     // Fragment shader CPU program.
00087     GpuProgramPtr mPSGpuProgram;
00088 
00089 private:
00090     friend class ProgramManager;
00091     friend class TargetRenderState;
00092 
00093 };
00094 
00098 }
00099 }
00100 
00101 #endif
